goal:
Please develop a complete calculator program with the following requirements:
1. Create a calculator program in `calculator.py` that can perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division
2. Create comprehensive unit tests for the calculator in `test_calculator.py` 
3. Run the tests to ensure everything works correctly
4. The coder should handle the implementation and the tester should handle the testing

This is a complete software development task that requires both coding and testing expertise.

rules.name: Initialize Project Structure
rules.action: Create project directory and initialize necessary files (calculator.py, test_calculator.py)
rules.expected_outcome: Project directory and initial files are created

rules.name: Implement Calculator Functions
rules.action: Implement addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division functions in calculator.py

rules.name: Write Unit Tests
rules.condition: test_calculator.py exists and calculator.py is implemented
rules.action: Write comprehensive unit tests for each function in calculator.py
rules.expected_outcome: test_calculator.py contains tests for all calculator functions

rules.name: Run Unit Tests
rules.condition: Unit tests are written and calculator is implemented
rules.action: Execute unit tests to verify calculator functions work correctly
rules.expected_outcome: All unit tests pass, confirming calculator functions work as expected

rules.name: Review and Refactor
rules.condition: Unit tests have been run and results are available
rules.action: Review test results and refactor code as necessary
rules.expected_outcome: Code is optimized and all tests pass
